title: Client Onboarding - Deploy RMM Agents
description: As part of a new client onboarding, a technician needs to deploy the RMM agent software to all of the client's computers.

tasks.description: Get a list of all computer hostnames from the client's Active Directory.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician has a complete list of target machines.

tasks.description: Use a deployment tool to push the RMM agent installation to all computers on the list.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent software is deployed across the client's environment.

tasks.description: Verify in the RMM console that all computers have checked in and are now under management.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician confirms that all devices are now visible and manageable.
